sect1.title: Writing Validators
sect1.para: Zend_Validate supplies a set of commonly needed validators, but inevitably, developers will wish to write custom validators for their particular needs. The task of writing a custom validator is facilitated by implementing Zend_Validate_Interface.

Zend_Validate_Interface defines two methods, isValid() and getMessages(), that may be implemented by user classes. An object that implements this interface may be added to a validator chain with Zend_Validate::addValidator().
